values: 信用；信誉；信贷；贷款；借款；学分；可信度；信任；赞誉；功劳；声望；荣誉；名声；归功于；（电影、电视节目等的）演职员表；（作者的）署名；（对某人的）认可；片头字幕；片尾字幕
认为…有功；归功于；信任；相信；把…记入贷方；贷记；把…存入账户；赞扬；表扬；认可；承认（某人的成就、努力）；把（某一成就、特点）归于某人；认定某人具有某种品质；认定某人具有某种能力

synonym.mean: 信用，信誉；贷款；学分；信任；声望
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂

sample.mean: n. 相信；听信；圣餐桌；供桌；可信度；真实性
n. 凭据；资质；证件；国书
adj. 可信的；令人信服的；能使人相信某事会发生（或成功）的
adj. 轻信的；容易受骗的
n. 竞争；角逐；比赛；竞赛；参与竞赛；比赛对手；竞争对手；角逐者
n. 成分的性质；组成方式；结构；作品；排版；排字；和解协议；和解偿还；组成

n. 喝彩；赞美；称赞

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可信的；声誉好的；值得称赞的
信任；凭证；祭器台（等于credence table，credenza）
好信誉；有资格接受信用贷款

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指单纯从主观上的相信，不着重这种相信是否有根据。
多指根据长期交往或实践，对某人某事有了认识和了解后产生的信心和相信，侧重其坚定性。
语气较强，强调完全相信；有时也能仅凭感觉产生的相信。
强调相信、信任的完全可靠。
指对某人某事有充分信心，断定不会使人失望，因而给予信任。
语气最弱，着重以声誉为信任的基础。

word_group.brief_definition: 把...贷给(某人)；把...归功于(某人)；认为当然有(某种性质等)
应该归功于...；归功于...；因...而得到好评
税收抵免；(尤指政府向有子女或低收入者提供的）补助金
认为是…的功劳, 把功劳归于自己；接受表扬
(尤用于提及缺点之后)就优点方面而言
信用合作社；互助储金会

bilingual.source: Customers pay for them with a credit card.

bilingual.target: 他们的信用评级被降级了。

bilingual.source: His line of credit has been exhausted.
bilingual.target: 他的信用额度已经用完了。

bilingual.source: Their business credit score is very high.
bilingual.target: 他们的商业信用评分非常高。

bilingual.source: They decided to increase my line of credit.
bilingual.target: 他们决定增加我的信用额度。

bilingual.source: His credit score dropped due to default.
bilingual.target: 他的信用评分因为违约而下降了。

bilingual.source: You can pay with a credit card at this store.
bilingual.target: 你可以在这家店用信用卡片付款。

list.abstract: credit（[ˈkredɪt]），英语单词，作名词释义为信用；赊购能力；贷项等，作动词释义为信任；相信；把…存入账户等。例句：I'll pay with my credit card.（我用信用卡付账。） credit的复数是credits，第三人称单数是credits，现在分词是crediting，过去式和过去分词是credited。短语搭配有credit card（信用卡）、take credit for（归功于...）、to one's credit（值得赞扬的是...）等。作名词的近义词有faith、reputation、honor、loan、confidence，作及物动词的近义词有put faith、 inbelieve in，反义词有debit、cash。
《Credit》是美国歌手Meghan Trainor的一首歌曲，被收录在其2015年发行的专辑《Title》里。该歌曲暂时没有MV。

yingyinNormal.en: How many credit default swaps do you own? Hmm? It doesn't make me wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们持有多少信用违约掉期交易？但这不代表我是错的。

yingyinNormal.en: And you target immigrants, too? Well, their credit actually isn't bad enough for him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也主要做移民的生意吗？移民的信用对他来说还不够糟呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you looked at the loan-level data? I mean, they're giving these loans to anybody with a credit score and a pulse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看过发放贷款的数据吗？任何人只要有信用评分都能随意拿到贷款。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's based on the inherent credit-worthiness of people who get drunk and urinate on police vehicles?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这还建立在他是个天生没信用，经常喝醉还在警车里小便的人渣的基础之上的？

yingyinNormal.en: With something called a credit default swap. It's like insurance on the bond, and if it goes bust you can make 10-to-1, even 20-to-1 return.
yingyinNormal.zh: 利用信用违约掉期，就好比债券的保险，如果崩盘你可以获利十倍，甚至二十倍。

yingyinNormal.en: You're healthy. You have a job in the sciences. I've got to say, if this credit report comes back good, you're the front runner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你很健康，你从事科学工作，不得不说，如果信用报告结果良好，你就是我的第一人选。

yingyinNormal.en: Trust me, I'm not driving a 7 Series without strippers. No one on the pole has good credit and they're all cash rich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 相信我，没有脱衣舞娘我现在也开不上宝马7系了，脱衣舞娘的信用普遍不高，但是现金充足。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, we won't pass even the credit check. According to my Social Security number, I died in a boat explosion years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行，但是我们俩连信用核查都不会过，如果检查我的社保号码，会发现我好多年前就死于船只爆炸了。

yingyinNormal.en: I did a comprehensive background check. Medical records, credit reports, criminal history. I trust you paid off those parking tickets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我对你的背景做了全面的调查，医疗记录，信用记录，犯罪史等等，我相信你已经缴清了那些停车罚单了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and his father invented that magnetic strip on the back of credit cards. Oh, I like credit cards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且他老爸还发明了信用卡背面的磁条。我也爱死信用卡了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I just don't think I have enough left on my credit card. Well, you can split it with another credit card.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的信用卡额度不够。你可以分两张刷。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so he's got money, and it's a few gifts and a car. And she got him to pay off all her credit cards. What? He paid off her credit cards?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，他是很有钱，买了很多礼物，还有车。她还让他付了她所有的信用卡账单。啥？他还帮她付信用卡账单？

yingyinNormal.en: What? So that you can dance with the woman that stole your credit card?
yingyinNormal.zh: 和偷你信用卡的人一起跳踢踏？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. I'm standing at a cash register, holding a credit card, and I'm bored.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我站在收银台，手里拿着信用卡，却觉得很无聊。

yingyinNormal.en: Would you consider mounds of credit card debt kind of a big deal financially? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你觉得身负大笔信用卡债务算不算重大的财务问题呢？算。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you behind on your credit card bills? Good! Pick up the phone and start dialing!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还付不起信用卡账单吗？太好了，给我拿起电话开始拨。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Yes, she is, hold on a second, please. Monana, it's for you, the credit card people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，她在，等等，莫娜娜，你的电话，信用卡公司打来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'll tell you, but please don't judge me. He pays for my car, my rent, and my credit cards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会告诉你们，但请不要鄙视我。我的车，我的房租和信用卡的账单都是他付的。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss Jones. This is Beydoun at the front desk. I will need a credit card number for the room charges.
yingyinNormal.zh: 琼斯小姐，我是前台的培杜姆，请用信用卡支付房费。

yingyinNormal.en: And the credit-card company. Phil made a large purchase on a Tibetan website called CopingCandles.Com.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有信用卡公司说，菲尔在一家名为“应对困难蜡烛网”的西藏网站上进行了大采购。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a unit of study counting toward a degree or diploma

examination_example.sentence: It's not necessarily a bad thing, but depending on the school, it can be costly to make up <highlight>credits</highlight> after switching too late in the game.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这未必是件坏事，但根据学校的情况，如果专业换得太晚，补学分的成本可能会很高。

sense_info_list.en: an estimate, based on previous dealings, of a person's or an organization's ability to fulfill their financial commitments

examination_example.sentence: Taxes on low-wage labor need to be cut, and wage subsidies such as the earned income tax <highlight>credit</highlight> should be expanded.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 应该减少对低工资劳动者的税收，扩大劳动所得税抵免等工资补贴。

sense_info_list.en: public acknowledgment or praise

examination_example.sentence: Once a discovery claim becomes public, the discoverer receives intellectual <highlight>credit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦公众接受一项发现声明，发现者会获得知识声誉。

sense_info_list.en: ascribe an achievement or good quality to someone

word_usage.usage: credit表示学分时，为可数名词。
tax credit指的是免税额度，为可数名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: [金融]赊账; 贷记; 存钱

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 把...贷给(某人)；把...归功于(某人)；认为当然有(某种性质等)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 败坏（人；物）的名誉；使（想法；证据）看似虚假

word_family.mean: n. 信用；赊购能力；贷项；赞许；赞扬；学分时；可信性；信贷；学分

sense_info_list.en: an estimate, based on previous dealings, of a person's or an organization's ability to fulfill their financial commitments

examination_example.sentence: She had no stable income, $12,000 in <highlight>credit</highlight>-card debt and no plan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她没有稳定的收入，背负着1.2万美元的信用卡债务，也没有任何计划。

sense_info_list.en: arrangement for deferred payment for goods and services
sense_info_list.zh: [金融]赊账; 贷记; 存钱

examination_example.sentence: Occupation and social economic status were strongly correlated, suggesting that our values are more economically driven than we usually give them <highlight>credit</highlight> for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业和社会经济地位密切相关，这表明我们的价值观比我们通常认为的更受经济驱动。

sense_info_list.en: public acknowledgment or praise

examination_example.sentence: To their <highlight>credit</highlight>, the world's agricultural scientists are embracing such a broad view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得称赞的是，世界农业科学家正在接受这样一个广泛的观点。

examination_example.sentence: Why does the speaker give <highlight>credit</highlight> to the world's agricultural scientists?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么演讲者称赞世界上的农业科学家？

sense_info_list.en: ascribe an achievement or good quality to someone

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>credit</highlight> their success to having someone in their life who believes in them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把自己的成功归功于生活中有人相信他们。

sense_info_list.en: favorable estimation; good reputation

examination_example.sentence: If you were in a management or leadership position, when discussing your current role, never take all the <highlight>credit</highlight> for accomplishments or achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你处于管理或领导的位置，当讨论你目前的角色时，千万不要把所有的功劳或成就都归于自己。

sense_info_list.en: the money lent or made available under a credit arrangement
a unit of study counting toward a degree or diploma
reliance on the truth or reality of something

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 指单纯从主观上的相信, 不着重这种相信是否有根据。
普通用词, 常表示一种缓和、不太肯定的口气。
侧重忠诚可靠与可信赖。
指对某人某事有充分信心, 断定不会使人失望, 因而给予信任。
多指根据长期交往或实践, 对某人某事有了认识和了解后产生的信心和相信, 侧重其坚定性。
语气最弱, 着重以声誉为信任的基础。
语气较强, 强调完全相信; 有时也能仅凭感觉产生的相信。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 败坏（人；物）的名誉；使（想法；证据）看似虚假

word_family.mean: n. 信用；赊购能力；贷项；赞许；赞扬；学分时；可信性；信贷；学分

sense_info_list.en: an estimate; based on previous dealings; of a person's or an organization's ability to fulfill their financial commitments

examination_example.sentence: I stopped using my <highlight>credit</highlight> card because I found I was spending excessively.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不再用我的信用卡，因为我发现我花钱太没节制了。

sense_info_list.en: a unit of study counting toward a degree or diploma

examination_example.sentence: Asian-American students have been eager participants in a state program that permits them to take summer classes off campus for high school <highlight>credit</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚裔美国学生一直热衷于参加一个州项目，该项目允许他们在校外修读暑期课程以获得高中学分。

examination_example.sentence: It offers various courses with <highlight>credit</highlight> points.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它提供有学分的各种课程。

examination_example.sentence: They specify the number of <highlight>credits</highlight> students must learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们具体规定了学生必须学习的学分数量。

sense_info_list.en: ascribe an achievement or good quality to someone
public acknowledgment or praise
the money lent or made available under a credit arrangement

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the money lent or made available under a credit arrangement
a unit of study counting toward a degree or diploma

examination_example.sentence: In his introduction, he made it clear that our <highlight>credits</highlight> would be hard-earned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在介绍中明确表示，我们的学分来之不易。

examination_example.sentence: The education department was offering a "free" course, called Thinking Chess, for three <highlight>credits</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教育系提供一门“免费”课程，名为“思维国际象棋”，学分为3个学分。

sample.mean: n. 相信；听信；圣餐桌；供桌；可信度；真实性
n. 凭据；资质；证件；国书
adj. 可信的；令人信服的；能使人相信某事会发生（或成功）的
adj. 轻信的；容易受骗的
n. 竞争；角逐；比赛；竞赛；参与竞赛；比赛对手；竞争对手；角逐者
n. 成分的性质；组成方式；结构；作品；排版；排字；和解协议；和解偿还；组成
adj. 含蓄的；不言明的；无条件的；无疑的；绝对的；隐式的；隐的；固有的；内含的；本质相关的
n. 喝彩；赞美；称赞
n. 精神；心灵；心；心智；精神实质；气质；特质；核心精神；烈性酒
n. 顶峰；最高点；政府首脑会议；最高级会议；峰会；极点

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the money lent or made available under a credit arrangement

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Credit</highlight> cards (信用卡) matter a lot less than before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信用卡没有以前那么重要了。

examination_example.sentence: People can use <highlight>credit</highlight> cards as payment at grocery stores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可以在杂货店用信用卡付款。

examination_example.sentence: Besides, many farmers do not accept <highlight>credit</highlight> (信用) cards or checks  (支票) as payment for their goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，许多农民不接受信用卡或支票作为商品付款方式。

examination_example.sentence: A study by <highlight>Credit</highlight> Suisse published in March found that young Chinese buyers are increasingly showing a home brand bias.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 瑞士信贷银行今年3月发布的一项研究发现，年轻的中国买家越来越倾向于本土品牌。

examination_example.sentence: Chen is the head of China buyer research at <highlight>Credit</highlight> Suisse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 陈先生是瑞士信贷银行中国买家研究部负责人。

sense_info_list.en: a unit of study counting toward a degree or diploma

examination_example.sentence: According to China Youth Daily, the labor course will take six <highlight>credits</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据《中国青年报》报道，这门劳动课将修六个学分。

examination_example.sentence: How many <highlight>credits</highlight> can voluntary service take?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 志愿服务可以获得多少学分？

examination_example.sentence: I give her full <highlight>credit</highlight> for making me the person who I am today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我完全相信是她成就了今天的我。
